content: Negli aeroporti di tutta Europa, si formarono lunghe code al banco check-in e alla biglietteria mentre i piani di viaggio venivano gettati nel caos.
translations: eng:At airports across Europe, long lines formed at check-in and ticketing desks as travel plans were thrown into chaos
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
